str2: A joint imitator. From a presumed compound of sun and mimeomai; a co-imitator, i.e. Fellow votary.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To look at, regard attentively, take heed, beware, consider. From skopos; to take aim at, i.e. regard.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.
From tupto; a die, i.e. a stamp or scar; by analogy, a shape, i.e. A statue, style or resemblance; specially, a sampler, i.e. A model or instance.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
